effect.armor.conversion.modifier{0}: Optional. <space>List of Fortifications (Comma<space> separated). Example. '<space>Fortified, Never Fortified'
effect.armor.conversion.modifier{1}: Optional. <space>List of Elements (Comma<space> separated). Example. '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.armor.conversion.modifier{2}: Dynamic Modifier Description. Example: '+2', 'x2', '+(# Blocked Enemies)'
effect.armor.convert{1}: List of Dynamic Modifier Descriptions (comma<space> separated). Example: '+2', 'x2', '+(# Blocked Enemies)'
effect.attack: Fully qualified Attack value. Example: 'Range Fire Attack 2 (Poison, Paralyzing) (Ineficient) [Cancelled]
effect.attack{3}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Poison, Paralyzing'
effect.attack.cancelled{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.attack.cancelled{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Range, Siege'
effect.attack.cancelled{2}: Optional. <space>List of Fortifications (Comma<space> separated). Example. '<space>Fortified, Never Fortified'
effect.attack.cancelled{3}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.convert{1}: List of Dynamic Modifier Descriptions (comma<space> separated). Example: '+2', 'x2', '+(# Blocked Enemies)'
effect.attack.modified{0}: Optional. Dynamic Attack Conversion Description. Example: 'Fire to Frost'
effect.attack.modified{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.attack.modified{2}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Range, Siege'
effect.attack.modified{3}: Optional. <space>List of Fortifications (Comma<space> separated). Example. '<space>Fortified, Never Fortified'
effect.attack.modified{4}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.modified{5}: Optional. <space>+List of Element Conversions (comma<space> separated). See: 'element.conversion'. Example: '<space>Fire to Frost, Physical to Chaos'
effect.attack.modified{6}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Type Conversions (comma<space> separated). See 'effect.attack.type.conversion'. Example: '<space>Range to Siege, Basic to Siege'
effect.attack.modified{7}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifier Conversions (comma<space> separated). See 'effect.attack.modifier.conversion'. Example: '<space>Poison to Brutal, Quick to Brutal'
effect.attack.modifier{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.attack.modifier{2}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Range, Siege'
effect.attack.modifier{3}: Optional. <space>List of Fortifications (Comma<space> separated). Example. '<space>Fortified, Never Fortified'
effect.attack.modifier{4}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.modifier{5}: Optional. <space>+Attack Modifier Gain Description (See 'effect.attack.modifier.gain'). Example. '<space>Gain Brutal, Swift'
effect.attack.modifier{6}: Optional. <space>+Attack Modifier Loss Description (See 'effect.attack.modifier.loss'). Example. '<space>Loses Brutal, Swift'
effect.attack.modifier.conversion{0}: List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.modifier.gain{0}: List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.modifier.loss{0}: List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Poison, Brutal'
effect.attack.type.conversion{0}: List of Attack Types (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Range, Siege'
effect.block: Fully qualified Block value. Example: 'Fire Block 2 (Inefficient)'
effect.block.convert{1}: List of Block Conversions (comma<space> separated). See 'effect.block.modifier'.
effect.block.gain{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Block Conversions (comma<space> separated). See 'effect.block.modifier'.
effect.block.modified{0}: Dynamic Modifier Description. Example: '+2', '+# Enemies Blocked'
effect.block.modified{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.block.modified{2}: Optional. <space>+List of Element Conversions (comma<space> separated). See: 'element.conversion'. Example: '<space>Fire to Frost, Physical to Chaos'
effect.block.modifier{0}: Value Modifier. Example: '+2', '+# of Enemies Blocked'
effect.block.modifier{1}: List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Poison, Brutal'
effect.card.slot.convert{0}: Target Slot Name. Example: 'Advanced Action', 'Basic Action'
effect.card.slot.multi_activate{0}: Target Slot Name. Example: 'Advanced Action', 'Basic Action'
effect.card.slot.convert.free{0}: Target Slot Name. Example: 'Advanced Action', 'Basic Action'
effect.offer.card.acquire.description.wi: List of Colors (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Red', 'Red, Blue'
effect.offer.card.activate.description{1: Card Effect Type. Example: 'Basic Effects', 'Advanced Effects'
effect.offer.card.activate.description.f: Card Effect Type. Example: 'Basic Effects', 'Advanced Effects'
effect.offer.card.activate.description.w: Card Effect Type. Example: 'Basic Effects', 'Advanced Effects'
List of Colors (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Red', 'Red, Blue'
effect.offer.card.activate.description.f: Card Effect Type. Example: 'Basic Effects', 'Advanced Effects'
List of Colors (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Red', 'Red, Blue'
effect.condition.enemy.fortified.descrip: Optional. <space>List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range, Block'
effect.condition.enemy.killed.descriptio: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range, Block'
effect.condition.phase.description{0}: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range, Block'
effect.condition.phase.description.durin: List of Phases (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Before Battle, Range, Block', 'Any'
effect.condition.target.resistance.descr: List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Fire, Frost', 'Any'
effect.condition.timeofday.description{0: List of Times (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night', 'Any'
effect.condition.player_terrain.descript: List of Terrains (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Swamp, Desert', 'Any'
effect.cost.card.description{2}: Optional. <space>+List of Card Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Spell, Relic'
effect.cost.card.description{3}: Optional. <space>+List of Card Colors (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Red, Blue'
effect.cost.mana.description{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Colors (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Red, Blue'
effect.cost.mana.description{2}: Optional. <space>+List of Mana Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Crystal, Token, Ambient'
effect.cost.with_indicator{0}: Cost Value ('9' or '1-3') goes here. This just adds an indicator '*' at the end of the cost.
effect.description.with_indicator{0}: Any text goes here. This just adds an indicator '*' at the end of the text.
effect.element.conversion{0}: List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Fire, Frost', 'Any'
effect.exploration.cost.convert.modifier: List of Times (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night', 'Any'
Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.exploration.distance.convert.modi: List of Times (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night', 'Any'
Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.immunity.gain{1}: List of Immunities (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Arcane, Physical'
effect.immunity.loss{1}: List of Immunities (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Arcane, Physical'
effect.influence.convert{0}: Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.mana.gain{0}: Mana Form with Color. Example: 'Red Crystal', 'Blue Token', 'Green Ambient'
effect.mana.copy.source.with_selection{0: Mana Form with Color. Example: 'Red Crystal', 'Blue Token', 'Green Ambient'
effect.mana.copy.offer.with_selection{0}: Mana Form with Color. Example: 'Red Crystal', 'Blue Token', 'Green Ambient'
effect.move.convert{0}: Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.move.gain{0}: Dynamic Value: '2', '# of Cards in Hand'
effect.move.cost.convert{0}: Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.move.cost.convert.modifier{0}: List of Terrains (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Swamp, Desert', 'Any'
effect.move.cost.convert.modifier{1}: Optional. <space>+List of Times (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Day, Night', 'Any'
effect.move.cost.convert.modifier{2}: Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.teleport.convert{0}: Dynamic Modifier Value: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.teleport.gain{0}: Dynamic Value: '2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.reputation.gain{0}: Dynamic Value: '2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.reputation.loss{0}: Dynamic Value: '2', '+# of Cards in Hand'
effect.resistance.gain{1}: List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Fire, Frost'
effect.resistance.loss{1}: List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: 'Fire, Frost'
effect.target.card.all.description{1}: Optional. (if Single Card Type is not provided) <space>+List of CardTypes (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Spell, Relic'
effect.target.card.all.with_slot.descrip: Target Name. Example: 'All Cards', 'All Red Spells'
effect.target.card.description{1}: Optional. (if Single Card Type is not provided) <space>+List of CardTypes (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Spell, Relic'
effect.target.card.with_slot.description: Target Name. Example: '1 Card', '1 Spell', 'All Spells'
effect.target.enemy.all.description{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Enemy Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Vermin, Abomination, Demons'
effect.target.enemy.group.description{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Enemy Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Vermin, Abomination, Demons'
effect.target.unit.all.description{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Level Restrictions (comma<space> separated). see 'effect.target.unit.level_restriction'. Example: '<space>Level 1, 2'
effect.target.unit.description{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Level Restrictions (comma<space> separated). see 'effect.target.unit.level_restriction'. Example: '<space>Level 1, 2'
effect.target.unit.level_restriction{0}: Optional. <space>+list of positive numbers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>1, 2'
effect.value.dynamic.format{0}: Dynamic Modifier Value. Example: '+2', '+# of Cards in Hand', '+# of Enemies Blocked'
effect.value.num_cards_played.descriptio: Optional. <space>+List of CardTypes (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Spell, Relic'
effect.value.num_enemies_faced.descripti: Optional. <space>+List of Enemy Types (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Vermin, Abomination, Demons'
effect.value.target.attack_elements{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.value.target.attack_modifiers{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Attack Modifiers (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Poison, Paraylizing'
effect.value.target.fortification{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Fortifications (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fortified, Never Fortified'
effect.value.target.immunity{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Immunities (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Arcane, Physical'
effect.value.target.resistance{0}: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.value.targeted_enemy_properties.d: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
effect.value.targeted_unit_properties.de: Optional. <space>+List of Elements (comma<space> separated). Example: '<space>Fire, Frost'
